name: aeroSOL
description: This is a Solana stakepool liquid stake token representation. We focus on supporting solana contributors and helping them achieve their goals. We are in partnership with both Sanctum and the Solana Foundation. You can go to our site https://aeropool.io to view our delegation strategy and even swap to some of our LST. It is a pretty straightforward idea, but we want users to be able to see the price of their aerosol in native wallets which is why coingecko listing is needed.
